thread.title: Indian visitors to Singapore show second highest growth rate
thread.title_full: Indian visitors to Singapore show second highest growth rate - The Economic Times

author: Anirban Chowdhury
title: Indian visitors to Singapore show second highest growth rate
text:
MUMBAI: Visitors from India recorded the second largest growth rate to Singapore , driven by demand from smaller cities. 

According to figures released by the Singapore Tourism Board (STB) on Friday, visitor numbers from India to Singapore grew by 8% in 2016 compared to the previous year. India followed China whose visitors to Singapore grew by 36% and beat Indonesia which grew by 6%. 

"The growth was due to more visitor arrivals from Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities in China, India and Indonesia, where STB had intensified its marketing efforts. India also overtook Australia to become Singaporeâ€™s 4th largest source market for visitor arrivals," said a statement from the board. 

In terms of tourism receipts or income in January-September, India came second registering a growth of 37%, following China which grew by 41%. Indonesia came third with a growth rate of 14%.
